T02D2973:48b-0: @48b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2973:49a-1: kyi las rgyun gcod par 'dod pas /
T02D2973:49a-2: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lag mthil g-yon par bsgom ste /
T02D2973:49a-3: rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang nyid lag ba
T02D2973:49a-4: spbu'i bu ga tshun chod rdo rjer byin gyi brlab
T02D2973:49a-5: la / rdo rje las me byung bas bskal pa'i tsha tsha 'phro bar dmigs la /
T02D2973:49a-6: bsgrub bya'i ming rus dur khrod kyir sa 'khris la de dug chang gi nang du bcug cing /
T02D2973:49a-7: aom sa ra sa ra m'a ra ya badzra bi
T02D2973:49a-8: d'a ra ya sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing gris gtubs
T02D2973:49a-9: nas dur khrod du rlung la 'phyar zhing bskur la
T02D2973:49a-10: che ge mo'i rig sngags kyi las gcad do zhes
T02D2973:49a-11: srad du nag po gris gcad cing me la bsreg
T02D2973:49a-12: go // de ltar byas na gdon mi za bar
T02D2973:49a-13: gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi gnod pa rgyud chod par
T02D2973:49a-14: go // nges so // gzhan gyi rig sngags gcad pa rgyun gcod spu gri zhes bya ba /
